Articles.Content: I have seen SWDennis controlling 2 or 3 aircrafts at once. I think he uses a mod, but I don't know what mod.  And is that mod compatible with 1.0.5?

I think that you are seeking for KOS mod. It alows to run scripts that fly by AI controled by your own script, while you control one craft that could also be controled by hand or trough KOS script.

Limitation is that all crafts have to be inside physical range, so KOS can properly run scripts and control crafts.
Not sure if this still functions in 1.0.5 but BurnTogether made some excellent formation flying possible.
Thank you for helping me. I'm going to test both of these.
